sentences.sContent: The buffet consisted of several different Indian dishes.
sentences.sCn: 自助餐由几种不同的印度菜组成。

sentences.sContent: Happiness does not consist in how many possessions you own.
sentences.sCn: 幸福不在于你拥有多少财产。

remMethod.val: con(共同) ＋ sist(站) → 站在一起 → 一致

trans.tranOther: to be formed from two or more things or people
